org.infogrid.comm

Class AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.infogrid.comm.AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEndpoint<T>, SendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFireAndForgetSendingMessageEndpoint

    public abstract class AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SendingMessageEndpoint<T>
    Factors out functionality common to many SendingMessageEndpoint implementations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T>
      Captures the types of events that can be sent to the listeners.
      protected static class  AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.TimedTask
      The task to perform actions later, such as the resending of messages that could not be delivered.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T> MESSAGE_ENQUEUED
      Indicates that a message was enqueued, but not sent yet.
      protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T> MESSAGE_RECEIVED
      Indicates that a message was received.
      protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T> MESSAGE_SENDING_FAILED
      Indicates that sending a message failed.
      protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.EventType<T> MESSAGE_SENT
      Indicates that a message was sent successfully.
      protected java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService theExecutorService
      The means by which to execute tasks.
      protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint.TimedTask theFutureTask
      The task that will be executed next.
      protected org.infogrid.util.AbstractListenerSet<MessageEndpointListener<T>,java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> theListeners
      The current set of MessageEndpointListeners.
      protected java.util.List<T> theMessagesToBeSent
      The outgoing queue of Messages to send.
      protected java.lang.String theName
      Name of the endpoint (for debugging).
      protected double theRandomVariation
      Multiplier of random variation on theDeltaResponse and theDeltaRecover, in order to avoid having repeated "collisions".

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint

        protected AbstractSendingMessageEndpoint(java.lang.String name,
                                         double randomVariation,
                                         java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService exec,
                                         java.util.List<T> messagesToBeSent)
        Constructor for subclasses only.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the MessageEndpoint (for debugging only)
        randomVariation - the random component to add to the various times
        exec - the ScheduledExecutorService to schedule timed tasks
        messagesToBeSent - outgoing message queue (may or may not be empty)
